venue.address_1: At the end of Zealand Road
venue.name: Zealand Parking Lot
venue.address_3: drive to the end and park in the lots

item.description:
Leaving from Zealand Trail head,and ending at Lincoln Woods hike to the Bonds, and Mt Zealand. 4 4000 foot peaks!

This is one of everyone's favorite vista hikes, so fair weather only. In case of bad weather, this hike will be postponed until Labor Day weekend.

Sign up if your interested and in good shape for this advanced level hike. This will be a long day, make sure your pack extra food and your headlamp.

Please be on time. We have to spot some cars at the hike finish and this will take time.

Group limits of 10 in the wilderness area. we naturally split into teams anyway, but with this car spot will make sure that everyone gets back to their car.


IF YOU ARE RUNNING LATE TRY TO PHONE US BEFORE 6AM AND GO DIRECTLY TO ZEALAND TRAILHEAD. WE MUST KNOW THAT YOU ARE COMING OR ELSE WE WILL ASSUME YOU CANCELED. some of us will be hiking an easier pace, so catching up isn't a problem
item.how_to_find_us: 5:30 carspot at Lincoln, then ride together to Zealand parking lot for start of hike. we have wifi at the motel, Diane 603-477-5116
item.name: Bonds Sunrise Hike
